title: Conservative Activist Sues Google Over AI-Generated Statements
description: Conservative activist Robby Starbuck sued Google on Wednesday, alleging the tech giant's artificial intelligence systems generated outrageously false information about him.
content:
Conservative activist Robby Starbuck sued Google on Wednesday, alleging the tech giant's artificial intelligence systems generated "outrageously false" information about him.

content:

title: Super Micro cuts first-quarter revenue forecast on delivery delays
description: (Reuters) -Super Micro Computer trimmed its first-quarter revenue forecast on Thursday, citing a shift in customer delivery schedules for large artificial intelligence deals.
content:

title: Exploring how AI could shape the future of student learning
description: As students settle into the new school year, one question looms large: How will artificial intelligence tools like ChatGPT affect their learning? Seeking answers, a team from Johns Hopkins recently introduced a chatbot into a classroom of middle and high school students to act as a co-tutor and study the impact.

title: Meta's Laid Off Employees Offered AI Startup Job By Indian-Origin Founder
description: Smallest AI, a US-based startup in San Francisco, offered jobs to Meta employees who were laid off from its AI department in its latest round of job cuts. Approximately 600 jobs were lost, according to Bloomberg, the mass layoffs were part of Meta's efforts to maintain its lead in the AI race against its competitors Open AI and Google. They were laid off from the artificial intelligence unit Meta Superintelligence Labs.
content:
Smallest AI, a US-based startup in San Francisco, offered jobs to Meta employees who were laid off from its AI department in its latest round of job cuts.

title: India's AI Prowess: Driving Productivity and Innovation Globally
description: India's strategic advantage lies in its capacity to deploy artificial intelligence solutions worldwide, enhancing productivity and innovation across sectors. Electronics and IT Secretary, S Krishnan, emphasized AI's crucial role in realizing India's 'Viksit Bharat' vision by 2047. AI can significantly improve agriculture, healthcare, and service quality.
content:
India's technological capability, particularly in artificial intelligence (AI), presents a unique opportunity for global influence in productivity and innovation, according to Electronics and Information Technology Secretary S Krishnan.
